name: Magic Trap
description:
To become the best among magicians, you need to go through a magic trap. Collect crystals of the same color and attack monsters. Today you will receive the title of the best!

Magic Trap is the best game in which your attentiveness and dexterity will be perfectly trained. Collect at least five crystals of the same color and attack the monsters. Don't forget to dodge pseudo crystals with spiky edges.

Game Features:
- Difficulty
- Beautiful Pixel Art
- Music
